lead_paragraph: The leader of the Houthi rebel movement said in a televised speech on Wednesday that he was willing to conduct negotiations in a “neutral country” to end Yemen’s nearly two-month-old armed conflict.

headline.main: Yemen: Houthi Leader Is Open to Talks
headline.print_headline: Yemen: Rebel Leader Is Open to Talks

snippet: The leader of the Houthi rebel movement said in a televised speech on Wednesday that he was willing to conduct negotiations in a “neutral country” to end Yemen’s nearly two-month-old armed conflict.
